awd_titl_txt: APS Division of Particles and Fields; Vancouver, anada;    August 18-22, 1991
awd_abstract_narration: This award will partially support the Particles and Fields                 Conference to be held in Vancouver, Canada; August 18-22, 1991.                 This is a meeting of the Division of Particles and Fields of the                American Physical Society, which will be held jointly with the                  Division of Particle Physics of the Canadian Association of                     Physicists on the campus of the University of British Columbia.                 Planary and parallel sessions will cover most of the currently                  active high energy physics topics and will provide a broad                      overview of what is being done now at the various accelerator                   centers of the World.  The award is for the partial support of                  US students and post-doctorals, who would otherwise have                        difficulty obtaining support.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
